title: No idea. Please help.
content:
Thank you in advance – greatly appreciate the help. ...Does anyone know what this font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615062022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_5604.jpg)
author: mpayson

comments.content: I’ve been puzzling over what I want [on my tombstone](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615062022/http:/typophile.com/node/58550). I think the title of this thread will do nicely.
